answer: It’s easy enough to unfollow if I don’t like it! So far, it looks fab. Also: YOU are the NICEST. And I’m going to answer this publicly because the last, lovely message you sent me via ask just *vanished* after I replied to it. Stop taking away my memories, Tumblr!
question: ha ha ha, aw shucks man, i don't know if you really want to have LMTYAS though. It's basically what I do when I've done too much manatee and I need to explode for a while. It is the actual worst blog. And now I am reading your blog and you say so many nice things! You are so nice!
